name: Tanisha Pledger
coverLetter: I have trimmed once before for a duration of three weeks. We worked in a team of about 10-15 people with individual work stations. I caught on quickly and would trim at least a pound a day. I have my olcc certificate and my permit is available once I can earn the money to pay for it. I am available weekdays, anytime and potentially some weekend days. I live in the Gresham, OR area, but Iâ€™m willing to travel up to 10 miles.
